page.title: 15LANHERNE BARTON FARM
page.content: Lanherne Barton has 140 sheep, and 92 bullocks.The Hawkey family work the farm fattening the animals for slaughter. They grow potatoes for their own use and flatpole for sheep. Rover is the working sheep dog.Farm machinery includes a tractor,trailer, hayturner,pasture topper ,manure distibuter. 10 hens are kept for eggs 2 cockerels,3 guinea fowls complete the farm animals. The farm is 70 acres and rented from Lanherne Convent. According to Stephen Hawkey aged 12, the hardest jobs are loading bales on to trailers, stacking bales, worming and shearing sheep, and clening the sheds. Stephen only feels sad about the few animals that become pets that go for slaughter.The working day begins at 8am.and lasts until 8pm. in the winter and 7pm. in the summer.
